price: 20. Nabii Muusa firqawnal gacisak:toysa anu tet abem anu iggima-le marak numuk teynah suge waqdi kaak iyye.
arabic: قَالَ فَعَلۡتُهَآ إِذٗا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla faʿaltuhā idhan wa-anā mina al-ḍālīna
